Sentencas: A modern optimization algorithm is used for maximizing the performance of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: At first, the cell is modeled using Artificial Neural Networks based on the experimental data sets.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: Then, a robust, simple, and quick optimization algorithm named radial movement optimizer is used for determining the optimal operating parameters of the cell.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: The cell parameters used in the optimization process are anode support layer thickness, anode porosity, electrolyte thickness, and cathode interlayer thickness.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: The optimization obtained results are compared with the previous optimized experimental results and those obtained using genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: Two sets of the parameters' constraints are considered during the optimization process.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: In the first set, the resulting optimal cell parameters are 0.5 mm, 76%, 20 mu m, and 62.26 mu m for anode thickness, anode porosity, electrolyte thickness, and cathode thickness respectively.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: Under this condition, the cell maximum power density is 1.8 W/cm(2), 2.25 W/cm(2) and 2.72 W/cm(2) for experimentally, genetic algorithm and the proposed strategy, respectively.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: This implies that using the proposed method increases the power density by 33.8% and 17.28% over the experimental and genetic, respectively.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms

Sentencas: In the second set, the proposed optimizer increases the maximum power by 28.85% compared with genetic optimizer.
Titulo: Maximizing SOFC performance through optimal parameters identification by modern optimization algorithms
